Content:: Bundesautobahn 648 (translates from German as Federal Motorway 648, short form Autobahn 648, abbreviated as BAB 648 or A 648) is a very short Autobahn and connects the western part of Frankfurt am Main with the Alleenring. The A 648 is the most important way to the city and to the Frankfurt Trade Fair.  This German road or road transport-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Bundesautobahn 648 - Wikipedia
